thread.title: 'Cabaret' returns to Houston; tickets on sale Oct. 30
thread.title_full: 'Cabaret' returns to Houston; tickets on sale Oct. 30 - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: 'Cabaret' returns to Houston; tickets on sale Oct. 30
text:
Photo: Joan Marcus, -- Image 1 of / 1 1 2015 Broadway Cast of Roundabout Theatre Company's "Cabaret." The show is coming to the Hobby Center. 2015 Broadway Cast of Roundabout Theatre Company's "Cabaret." The show is coming to the Hobby Center. Photo: Joan Marcus, -- 'Cabaret' returns to Houston; tickets on sale Oct. 30 1 / 1 Back to Gallery Individual tickets for the national tour of "Cabaret," playing March 22-27 at Hobby Center, will go on sale at 10 a.m. Oct. 30.
The Roundabout Theatre Company's tour recreates the Tony-winning 1998 Broadway revival co-directed by Sam Mendes and Rob Marshall. That production ran for eight years, then returned for a year-long encore beginning in spring 2014.
The classic John Kander-Fred Ebb-Joe Masteroff musical premiered on Broadway in 1966 and won eight Tonys including best musical. The show portrays the decadent nightlife of Berlin on the eve of the Third Reich's rise to power, centering on a visiting writer who becomes embroiled in the tumultuous life of a hedonistic cabaret entertainer.
Tickets will be available by phone at 800-982-2787, online at BroadwayAtTheHobbyCenter.com , and at the Hobby Center box office, 800 Bagby.
